transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Nam, ami bolchilam, ha, shunte parchen?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. ha ji sir. ha sunai de raha hai aapko?
Customer: Ha ji sunai de raha hai bataiye.
Executive: Mai bol raha hu mai Rahul Khan bol raha hu MK Brighter aalu aap se.
Customer: Ha ha mai samajh gayi bataiye aap.
Executive: Mai bol raha hu mera jo dikkat aa raha hai na mam mere ko Nasim bhai ne pehle bola tha jo South mein Nasim bhai jo mere ko account khol ke rakh
khol tha, thik hai?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Ha kya bola tha bataiye?
Executive: Wo bola tha jo Chennai mein Tamil Nadu Chennai ka jo jo jo street hai wo sab mein dekh nahi dekhna chahega wo pehle bola tha. Accha apni ek ek bar baat hui hai isme apni aapne bola tha maine aapko ye bola tha company to dekhega sir Chennai Tamil Nadu mein.
Customer: Ha Tamil Nadu ka.
Executive: Ha. Lekin mera jo dikkat aa raha hai wo jo mera jo material jo dukandar ko deta hu Chennai mein. Aur jis party ko mai maal deta hu.
Customer: Wo dealer sab same hi hai. Thik hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dealer sab totally properly same hai jo dealer se fabric aata hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo Bengaluru mein wo jo mera party hai wo usko bol diya jo ye aapka jo jiska paas mein fabric ja raha hai wo IndiaMART mein account khol liya. Wo bhi IndiaMART mein all India visit karta hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Mera udhar mera udhar bahut sara paisa hansa hua hai, thik hai? Isiliye mai bol raha hu aisa kuch ho sakta hai kya pura sa udhar nahi dikhna chahiye side.
Executive: Nahi sir aisa nahi hota hai company to dekhega na customer nahi lena hai wo cheez ho sakti hai. Baat kariye aapka aadmi aaya hai baat kariye.
Customer: Mam koi bhi side mein off nahi kar sakte matlab?
Executive: Aap to IndiaMART ko aapko nahi pata ye kaise ho sakta hai. India platform hai ye to nahi ho sakta. ye hai customer band karwa sakte hai. Ke not preferred location karwa denge South ke location wo ho sakta hai.
Customer: Kya ho sakta hai mam?
Executive: Ye ho sakta hai ke hum South ki locations ko hatwa de matlab customer nahi aayega. Aisa nahi hoga ke unka unka company to dikhega visibility South mein visibility visibility bhi dikhega ha. Agar koi search karega na Google pe inka company ka naam ya kuch bhi product to inka company to aayega na.
Customer: Ha ha ye to sahi hai.
Executive: Wo cheez to nahi karwa sakte na aap khud batao agar South se Chennai se koi bhi search kar raha hai inke product man lo koi blouse ya saree kuch bhi search kar to inka company to agar dikhe agar sara dikhega to inka company bhi dikhega na listing visibility hoga to hum wo company ka kaise rok de company to dikhta hi hai hum by lead customer rok sakte hai South ka. Ke hum not preferred location mein Chennai Tamil Nadu wagera jo bhi hai bole wo hum mark karwa de.
Executive: Company nahi rok sakte na wo to dikhta hi hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm samajh pa raha hu.
Executive: Ha to inko issue kya hai company nahi dikhwana hai. Sir ye baat to aapko inhe pehle ha.
Customer: Unka main problem ho raha hai wo all India deal karne ke liye ready hai bas Chennai mein deal nahi karna chahte hai.
Executive: Chennai mein nahi karna chahte hai to wo ye to starting mein jab starting mein jab maine welcome call kiya tha inka maine ye cheez boli thi maine clear cut ko bola tha sir dekho all over India dikhega bas aapko agar chahiye customer na aaye wo mai karwa dungi ki not preferred location maine mark karwa li by lead nahi aayegi aapko South se lekin company dikhega.
Customer: Nahi by lead aane se unko koi issue nahi hai. Ha company nahi dikhna chahiye na to to dikhega na sir aap khud socho wo kaise band hoga?
Executive: Koi bhi search karega agar to kaise wo to dikhega hi. Wo to Google se listing hota hai direct apna IndiaMART to all over India dikhata hai to wo to dikhega hi na.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To abhi aap dekh lo abhi to wo cheez to possible hi nahi hai.
Customer: Samajh gaya.
Customer: Hmm? Se baat karaiye meri. Se baat karaiye. Ha ha baat karaiye.
Customer: Ha boliye mam.
Executive: Hello. Ha boliye boliye mam.
Customer: Ha sir maine mai wahi keh rahi hu ke wo to possible nahi hai sir all over India dikhega aapka.
Customer: To fir mere ko band karna padega mam udhar mera bahut paisa atak atak rakha hai.
Executive: Band karna padega. To ye baat aapko pehle nahi batai thi kya ki all over India dikhega. Madam pehle maine Nasim bhai se baat kiya hua tha wo bola nahi dikhega isiliye mai agree hua mam nahi to kyu mai itna risk leta lunga kaise boliye mam.
Executive: Ab sir dekho ye cheez to galat hai customer aapko nahi chahiye wo ho sakta hai lekin company to dikhta hai sir all over India aisa nahi ho sakta ki hum South ka company rok de. Baki ek bar mai ek kam karungi ke mai apne na ek bar senior se bhi call karwaungi agar unko mere se jyada knowledge ho waise to aisa hota nahi hai. Thik hai ek bar mere senior bhi aapko call karenge thik hai tab dekh lete hai kya ho sakta hai hai na aur baki aapne jo bola mam sahi hai lekin mera baat suniye aapne jo bola mam sahi hai net mein search karega na wo kahi bhi aayega wo to dikh jayega mam. Wo pehle hi Nasim bhai se mera baat suniye mam pehle hi mai Nasim bhai se bol diya mera Chennai mein mera side nahi dikhna chahiye bola ekdam possible hai isiliye maine agree hua mam nahi to mera khud ka itna itna invest kiya udhar kaise mai agree ho sakta hu jis party ko mai deta hu usi kali mein check karunga kya bol rahe ho. Sahi baat hai. Yahi dikkat ho gaya na. Ab ye Nasim bhai se baat ho rahi thi kya meri?
Customer: Nahi nahi wo alag aadmi hai.
Executive: Accha thik hai to ek bar aap ek bar mere senior aapko call karenge to ek bar aur dekh lete hai thik hai kya ho sakta hai baki fir aap jaisa kahenge waisa dekhte hai.
Customer: Thik hai ek bar aap baat kariye baat karke mere ko boliyega nahi to mere band karna padega mam thik hai. Baki sir abhi ek cheez aur hai ki aapne 9696 pe call kiya tha to yaha pe concern open ho gaya hai mai aapka yaha se concern close kar rahi hu thik hai aur fir mai apne senior se call dilwa rahi hu.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai okay.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to stop visibility in Chennai.

- Claims Nasim Bhai said it was possible.

- Money is stuck due to visibility issues.



Resolution:

- Explained company visibility cannot be stopped.

- Offered to block buyleads from South India.

- Will have a senior executive call the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Senior executive will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, visibility, chennai, buyleads, company
